page.title: 13A day in the life of R.Gates
page.content: At 7.20 my alarm goes off.I get up and have a wash.At 7.50 I am watching TV. I'm off to school at 8.20 and I arrive at school at 8.35.At 9.00 I go in for lessons and at 10.30 the bell goes for playtime.I go out and eat my snack.The whistle goes and we have to come in.At 10.50 lessons start again.Lessons are until 12.00 and then dinner time comes. I eat my sandwiches and go out onto the field. I go in at 1.25 and have my afternoon lessons.Again the bell goes for break at 2.25 which ends at 2.40.I come in for our last lesson;it's always something good.We go home at 3.40 and I arrive home at 3.55. I unpack my bag and then sit down to watch TV.At 5.30 I have my tea and my Dad arrives home.I finish tea at 6.00. After Cello practice I watch TV until 8.30.Then I go to bed,read and sleep.
